duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform emergency and routine maintenance on all manufacturing equipment, including equipment changeovers, and assist production personnel to minimize downtime.
Install and repair electrical, mechanical, hydraulic, and pneumatic systems, ensuring equipment is maintained in top working condition.
Diagnose and repair faulty electrical components of machines such as motors, AC/DC drives, and sensors as well as Automation controls, such as PLC IO

education_certification.credential: Technical Diploma in Mechanical or Electrical Engineering (Bachelor's degree preferred)
